title: My ambitions

abstract: So much suffering in the world, yet so much beauty.
description: Since David Clune first travelled to Japan at 16, he developed a thirst for travel that has never been quenched. In all his travels, he has witnessed suffering amongst the beauty and it has encouraged in him a desire to make a difference, even though he is content in Australia...for now.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002004; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007); Active; 2007
